official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Labor to maintain a publicly
		  available list of all employers that relocate a call center overseas, to make
		  such companies ineligible for Federal grants or guaranteed loans, and to
		  require disclosure of the physical location of business agents engaging in
		  customer service communications, and for other purposes.
